    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship(java.lang.String name,
            Ship.ShipType shipType,
            CannonType cannonType,
            CannonShot.CannonShotType cannonShotType,
            float x,
            float y,
            float r)
        Builds a ship at a given location and rotation and of a specific model.
        Parameters:
        shipType - The type of ship to be drawn
        x - The x coordinate where the ship should be placed
        y - The y coordinate where the ship should be placed
        r - The rotation the ship should be set at when placed.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
        Draws the ship at the appropriate location and appropriate rotation.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface Entity
        Parameters:
        batch - the batch that the ship is drawn from.

      • moveShots

        public void moveShots()
        Moves the ship. Based on direction dir, the ship's direction is changed. Then based on the ship's sail state sailState the ship is then given a speed. After ensuring the ship is still in the world from the previous call on move(), the ship's position is then calculated and applied.

      • hit

        protected void hit(CannonShot cannonShot,
                   CannonType cannonType,
                   Ship enemy)

      • move

        public void move()
        Description copied from interface: Entity
        Move the entity across the screen
        Specified by:
        move in interface Entity

      • ensureInWorld

        private void ensureInWorld()
        Ensures the ship is still in the world, and if not, places is back in the world with it's rotation reversed.

      • moveLeft

        private void moveLeft()
        Increases the rotation of the ship by 1 degree. Based on a circle of 360 degrees where 0 degrees is North of the ship.

      • moveRight

        private void moveRight()
        Reduces the rotation of the ship by 1 degree. Based on a circle of 360 degrees where 0 degrees is North of the ship.

      • getCenterPosition

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getCenterPosition()

      • getPositionFrontOfShip

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPositionFrontOfShip()
        Gives a point in front of the ship from a predetermined distance HOW_FAR_FROM_SHIP 90 Degrees is added to the original computation to make 0 degrees North of the Ship
        Returns:
        The position in front of the ship

      • disposeTextures

        public void disposeTextures()
        Disposes all textures that the given ship uses. Should never be called on player directly, as textures should remain between battles.
        Specified by:
        disposeTextures in interface Entity

      • setDebug

        public void setDebug(boolean debug)
        Sets whether the debug features will be displayed
        Parameters:
        debug - set to true for viewing debug, false for hiding debug
